name: Desperate Counter
Lore: 'The Empire relied on the skill of its pilot corps to defend the Death Star reactor core from attack.',
Text: 'Deploy on Death Star II system. When opponent moves from a related sector, for each TIE armed with a weapon there, movement destiny is -3 (limit -9). Also, you may deploy either Combat Response or Imperial Arrest Order from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
